column5: So we got out on Monday with the kids. We met up with their grandpa and Uncle Dave on the boat at Black Rapid Locks. The weather turned out great!      We decided that we would go down to Hurst Marina and fuel up then head to Kelley's to get fed and on to fishing!! Along the way we saw plenty of great houses.      And some really cool boats.      This last one was full of old people on tour, they were cleaning it when we got there.   I asked my daughter what she thought of the scenery and this is what i got in return   So we looked on the fishfinder for some spots and I asked Cole what his opinion of the spot was.   We finally found a spot to fish.        and my proud moment, Thea finally lipping a bass!   We headed back as we were all tired and ready to head home     All and all a great day on the water!!!  Denis
Great family report and pics. Pontoons make great kid fishing boats. The fishfinder and eyes covered shot is great.
Great pics.  Was out fishing on Sunday in Rideau Ferry when the Kawartha Voyageur went by.  Saw lots of the trawler style boats up that way too, very popular it seems on the lakes that way.
Thats a nice family fishing boat. Looks like the kids had a lot of fun. Some nice houses on the Rideau. Thanks for sharing.
Great report and pics Tinman Another super day on the water!!  High five to Thea for lipping that bass Very nice houses on that part of the Rideau.... Thanks for sharing Leechman

Very Nice Tinman! Those kids of yours are really going to be spoiled now. That is like fishing from your sofa! LOL If you had a place to leave it in the water, pontoon boats would be great. Nice shots of the family and your day on the water.
What a super report with great scenery shots.  Your daughter looks like she's gonna be a handful with a great sense of humour eh  Joey
Nice report.  I have trouble getting some of my friends to lip a bass....and they're in their twenties, lol.
Another great adventure Tinman keep reeling those big fish in!
Thanks Folks! I'm addicted to them fishing now! The look on their faces i priceless!
Well said Tinman, well said. LM
Great report Tinman I am headed there for one week of camping looks like a great River to go fishing
Great mike! where you camping and fishing out of?
Nice report anytime on the water with the kids is a great time glad you got out and shared it with us
great report, love seeing the family reports and all the smiles on the kid's faces, that's something they will remember forever
